text: Anata gata keiten'notami yo, shito-tachi ga chūdan sa reta nochi waga shito ga yattekite, anata gata ni taishi (jibutsu no) kaimei o suru. Kore wa anata gata ni,`watashi-tachi ni wa kippō no dentatsu-sha mo keikoku-sha mo konai.' To iwa senai tamedearu. Ima, kippō o tsutae keikoku o ataeru mono ga, masani anata gata no sho ni kita nodearu. Makotoni arrā wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru
